short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tarnation! Remove all that dern crap from links in Google search hits!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A privacy-reclaiming tool that opts you out  of "The Big 4's" tracking mechanisms. Taking back your privacy, is the scrum-deli-umptious sundae. Tagging their front door with a customized status indicator is the cherry on top...(left)...
